data.name: Takumi Fujiwara
data.description: The main character of the Initial D series and the son of legendary street racer Bunta Fujiwara.

data.name: Ryosuke Takahashi
data.description: is the founder, and leader of both the Akagi RedSuns and Project D. Famously nicknamed Akagis White Comet

data.name: Keisuke Takahashi
data.description: An ex-bosozoku gang member, he was introduced to street racing by his brother Ryosuke and joined his team, the Akagi RedSuns.

data.name: Bunta Fujiwara
data.car: Subaru Impreza WRX STi Type R Version V
data.description: Bunta was the original driver of the mysterious 'white ghost of Akina' AE86 Sprinter Trueno that holds the record of the fastest downhill time at Akina.
